name: Hambi Treehouse Builder
description:
The Game is about building your own tree house, in order to save the Hambacher Wald! You can put whatever you like on the baseplatform, but be aware that RWE agents will try to destroy the treehouse, by shaking the tree!

You place the Objects through drag and drop. The RWE tree-shake-action will be triggered by pressing the button simulate. The button in the top right corner restarts the game.

Have fun building your treehouse!
